mutants.code:
def calculate_maximal_coloring_values(n, weights, edges):
    wp = [(weights[i], i + 1) for i in range(n)]
    wp.sort(reverse=True)
    adjacency_list = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        adjacency_list[u].append(v)
        adjacency_list[v].append(u)
    s = sum(weights)
    ans = [s]
    i = 1
    c = 1
    p = 0
    while c < n - 1:
        for _ in range(len(adjacency_list[wp[i][1]]) - 1):
            s += wp[i][0]
            ans.append(s)
            c += 1
            if c == n - 1:
                p = 1
                break
        i += 1
        if p == 1:
            break
    return ans

    s = sum(weights)

    i = -1

    return ans

def calculate_maximal_coloring_values(n, weights, edges):
    wp = [(weights[i], i + 1) for i in range(n)]
    wp.sort(reverse=True)
    adjacency_list = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        adjacency_list[u].append(v)
        adjacency_list[v].append(u)
    s = sum(weights)
    ans = [s]
    i = 0
    c = 1
    p = 0
    while c < n - 1:
        for _ in range(len(adjacency_list[wp[i][1]]) - 1):
            s += wp[i][0]
            ans.append(s)
            c += 1
            if c == n - 2:
                p = 1
                break
        i += 1
        if p == 1:
            break
    return ans

    wp = [(weights[i], i + 1) for i in range(n)]
    wp.sort(reverse=True)
    adjacency_list = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        adjacency_list[u].append(v)

    s = sum(weights)
    ans = [s]

            ans.append(s)
            c += 1

                p = 1
                break
        i += 1
        if p == 1:
